db_treshold_help_string: Sets/adjusts the threshold of the sound sensor/microphone.
per_sec_help_string: Sets how many times per unit time it checks the noise level.
time_frame_help_string: Sets the interval for calculating the average noise.
timeout_help_string: Delay after the sound is played.
audio_help_string: Select a sound to play or use your own audio file.
sound_volume_help_string: Adjusts the volume of the playback sound.
help_intro_string: You can use the preset values or adjust them to your liking.
share_string: Great app, have a look! https://www.google.com
email_string: This email is related to the Snorty app.
select_sound_desc_string: Choose 'Default Sounds' for preset alerts or 'Choose...' if you want to use your own sound.
save_dialog_desc_string: Are you sure you want to save this settings?
